DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study ass whether daily dose medium chain triglyceride subject mild cognitive impairment ( MCI ) improve cognitive performance .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Medium Chain Triglyceride Oil Supplementation Mild Cognitive Impairment
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty eligible subject enrol study consist baseline visit follow six post-baseline visit . The control placebo group comprise ten subject randomly assign group . The assessment baseline include concomitant medication , vital sign , height , weight . In addition , subject complete medical history questionnaire , receive group instruction incorporation study product diet registered dietitian . Study product dispense visit excess requirement , re-issued every visit measurement remain product subject instruct bring every visit . The post-baseline study visit include body weight vital sign measurement , concomitant medication , dispensation study product , group instruction register dietitian , assessment adverse event . Between study visit subject receive telephone call study coordinator encourage compliance diet , ask adverse event . The study visit conclude week 24 . The psychological test conduct clinician screen repeat cognitive test visit .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Are male female diagnosis Mild Cognitive Impairment 2 . Are 50 year age old 1 . Been medication Mild Cognitive Impairment le 90 day 2 . Major depression 3 . Uncontrolled hypothyroidism 4 . Known B12 deficiency 5 . Hepatic ( liver ) disease insufficiency
